Okay, I understand the game. I need to protect the base ('#') from the aliens ('@'). I can shoot using ACTION_USE (1), and move LEFT (2) and RIGHT (3).

Currently, an alien is present at (0,4). I am at (10,15). My base is mainly located on the upper left corner and upper right corner. There is also sam at (9,15).
My strategy is to move left to get the sam. Then move to the left corner to eliminate the alien.
